data.description: Access Dialog(text widget tool) through perl
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is for interfacing Dialog(a command line utility to
    draw text based widgets, quite a famous one) from perl.

    Although it uses system command internally to call the dialog
    script with appropriate command line options, it takes care for
    providing Object oriented interface for applications, it might be
    useful for applications to call dialog in a OO-ish way
